Description.Text:
Cabot Mews development is a brand new, stylish collection of luxury apartments in the colourful, heart of Bristol. Combining elegant design, industrial chic and traditional architecture, the development creates a unique urban feel. Each stunning brand new 2 bedroom apartment has designer bathrooms and a living area which incorporates a bespoke kitchen with top of the range appliances.
PLEASE NOTE: Before arrival at the apartments, all guests will be asked to provide a valid credit card as security. This will be held to insure against damage being caused to the apartment and any extras requested.

Located just minutes from Cabot Circus shopping centre with its wide variety of restaurants, bars, top of the range shops and entertainment venues. The apartments are situated only a short walk from the city centre and Bristol Temple Meads with great links to public transport.

Superior Two Bed Apartment - This superior apartment offers two double beds and two bathrooms with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. All apartments have a balcony or a terrace. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability): Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
Contemporary Apartment - Contemporary apartment offers two double beds with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. All apartments have a balcony or a terrace. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability): Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
Contemporary Apartment - Contemporary Apartment offers one double bed with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. All apartments have a balcony or a terrace. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability): Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
